City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 6:30 p.m.
* 2nd and 4th Monday of each month and any special meetings
* Princeton Municipal Center  
  2000 E Princeton Drive  
  Princeton, TX 75407
* Phone: 972-736-2416
* **To watch the upcoming live meeting, click [here](http://media.swagit.com/sles).**

Ordinance & Rules
-----------------

* [Resolution No. 2023-11-13-R04 Revised Invocation Procedures (PDF)](https://princetontx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/2351)
* [Council Relations Policy, Rules of Order, and Code of Ethics - Amended (PDF)](https://princetontx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/1685)
* [Dress Code and Rules of Decorum (PDF)](https://princetontx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/375)
* [Texas Open Meetings Act (PDF)](https://princetontx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/406)
* [Resolution No. 2022-11-14-R01 - Ceremonial and Appearance Request (PDF)](https://princetontx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/1577)

### Watch Live

Watch live meetings and view video recordings of previous meetings by visiting our [Video Archive website](https://princetontx.new.swagit.com/views/261/).

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available before the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

* [City Council Archived Minutes](https://princetontx.gov/Archive.aspx?AMID=51)
* [Community Development Corporation Archived Minutes](https://princetontx.gov/AgendaCenter/Community-Development-Corporation-3)
* [Economic Development Corporation Minutes](https://princetontx.gov/AgendaCenter/Economic-Development-Corporation-7)
* [Library Advisory Board](https://princetontx.gov/AgendaCenter/Library-Advisory-Board-4) - To view Library Advisory Board Meetings, please visit the [Library Advisory Board](https://www.princetontx.gov/196/Library-Advisory-Board) page.
* [Planning & Zoning Commission Minutes](https://princetontx.gov/AgendaCenter/Planning-Zoning-Commission-5) and [Additional P&Z Archived Minutes](https://princetontx.gov/Archive.aspx?AMID=52&Type=&ADID=)
* [Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone Board Archived Minutes](https://princetontx.gov/Archive.aspx?AMID=55)
* [Zoning Board of Adjustments Archived Minutes](https://princetontx.gov/Archive.aspx?AMID=54)
* [View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://princetontx.gov/AgendaCenter/City-Council-2)
